Resume

I'm Graham Hagenah, a full-stack web developer who builds accessible, performant websites and web apps. I focus on clean front-end craftsmanship, thoughtful UX, and maintainable systems across static sites, CMS builds, and modern JavaScript stacks.

Work History

  1. Sep 2022 – Present · Remote / Massachusetts

    Web Developer, Freelance

    Design and build marketing sites, portfolios, and content-driven platforms for small businesses and nonprofits.

    • Deliver fast, accessible sites using Eleventy, modern CSS, and JavaScript.
    • Collaborate directly with clients on UX, content structure, and deployment.
  2. Mar 2021 – Aug 2022 · Westwood, MA

    Web Developer, The Predictive Index

    Built and maintained marketing pages and web experiences for a workplace analytics platform.

    • Shipped new site sections and landing pages with a focus on performance.
    • Partnered with design and marketing on reusable components.
  3. Jun 2019 – Mar 2021 · Concord, MA

    Web Developer, Bartlett Interactive

    Produced websites for nonprofits and local organizations, from discovery through launch.

    • Built CMS-driven sites and custom front-end components.
    • Optimized for accessibility, SEO, and editor-friendly content workflows.
  4. 2018 – 2019 · Amherst, MA

    Graphic Designer, University of Massachusetts

    Created multimedia assets for print and web in support of campus marketing.

Education

B.S. Multimedia Informatics — University of Massachusetts Amherst (2018)

Focus Areas

Front-end development, static site generation, CMS builds (WordPress), responsive design, accessibility, performance optimization.
